Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to a reduced or free fare program in the MTA for disabled veterans
Summary: Directs the MTA to establish a reduced or free fare program for disabled veterans.
LawCode: Amd ยง1266, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to a reduced rate or no fare program in the metropolitan transportation authority for disabled veterans
